contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Chapter 16 - The Truth About God's Will

fields.notesFormatted:
What is God's will?

  1. When it comes to our journey, everybody counts.

    Psalms 1:1, 13:20

  2. There will always be opportunities. Find them.

    Ephesians 5:15-17

  3. God's purpose is more important than our rights.

    Galatians 2:20

God's will is

  1. Not as clear as we think.

  2. Not always the easiest path.

  3. More about who we are, than where we are.

  4. All about obedience in the little things.

    Romans 12:1-2
